register.title: Register trialaccount
register.description: You can use Your Vinou® trial account 1 months for free including all features of the Vinou® platform. After the 1 months trial phase you can choose using Vinou® further or your account will be deleted automatically. You’ll be reminded via email and can choose wisely.
register.send: Congratulations your account was created. Within the next minutes you'll receive an email to activate your user and set a password.

verify.title: Send verification
verify.contact:
Get in contact with us:
kontakt@vinou.de · +49(0) 6131 62 45 390

success.common: We send a verifcation letter containing an activation link to {customer.name}, {customer.company}, {customer.address}, {customer.zip} {customer.city}. After activation you're able to use all of our network functions for free for 30 days.
success.reinvite: An invitation has been sent to {customer.mail}. Use the link in the mail to get verified.

error.common:
Oops, an error occured. The verification could not be sent.

Please contact us to start networking as soon as possible.
error.completed:
You are already verified. A letter with an activation link is sent to you by mail to address: {customer.name}, {customer.company}, {customer.address}, {customer.zip} {customer.city}. After successfully activation you are welcome to test the full functionallity of our network for a trial of 30 days.

If you did not receive a postcard from us, please feel free to contact us, to get started immediately.
error.expired:
Oops, an error occured. The verification could not be sent. Invitation term is expired.

Please contact us to start networking as soon as possible. Use contact:
kontakt@vinou.de · +49(0) 6131 62 45 390

activate.title: Finish verification
activate.description: Only one step until your personal membership. Please insert name, e-mail and password to create an administrator user for your Vinou-Account.
activate.error:
The verification could not be finished. Please try again or get in contact with us to get started immediately.

Contact us:
kontakt@vinou.de · +49(0) 6131 62 45 390

upgrade.title: Upgrade Membership
upgrade.description: Being a Vinou-Commerce member you can use all features by paying a monthly fee of 40 EUR excluding VAT. Each negotiated order generates a promotion fee of 1 EUR excluding VAT. The monthly fee will be invoiced every month in advance. The promotion fee will be invoiced at 1st of following month

teaser.publish: You are using Vinou-Publishing. To activate the full featured Version please upgrade to Vinou-Commerce.
teaser.trial: You are using Vinou within the trial phase. To continously using all features please upgrade to Vinou-Commerce.

upgrade.bank: Bancaccount for SEPA direct debit mandate

field.name: Contact person
field.cop: I've read the conditions of purchase and agree
field.trust: I accept that my account will be deleted if my usage doesn't fit to the conditions of use or the customers credentials aren't real
field.payment: I accept that Vinou will debit the monthly fee with added value tax and the placements fee for each external orders from the given account.

toasts.upgrade_error: An error occured. Vinou-Commerce wasn't activated!
toasts.activation_error: An error occured. Account could not be activated!

account.title: Account settings
account.description: Adminstrate your invoice address, membership oder bank account e.g.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Check and manage the current status of your membership.

customer.title: Invoice information
customer.description: Administrate information for your Vinou-Membership. These informations won't be shown public in network.

merchants.title: My wine store
merchants.description: Define additional companies for your wine store. These are public informations shown within the Vinou network.

wineries.title: My winery
wineries.description: Define additiona wineries to sell your wines for example as winery or as bottler. These are public informations shown within the Vinou network.

payments.title: Payment methods
payments.description: With different payment methods you're able to make your webshop more attractive to your clients.

packagings.title: Package options
packagings.description: Configure your package options regarding count of bottles or weight of an order. This is really important to use your webshop.

packagingunits.title: Packaging units
packagingunits.description: Configure your boxes to send your wines that will be used for shipment. These boxes will be used also to calculate your shipment labels.

priceranges.title: Preis ranges
priceranges.description: Configure your price ranges to setup individual client prices.

shipment.title: Shipment settings
shipment.inactive: Activate shipment management service by Vinou and shipcloud to generate shipment labels directly by using the Vinou WebApplication
shipment.description: Configure shipment e.g. to select a default shipment carrier.

technical.title: Technology
technical.description: For some aspects you need to configure some technical stuff. This is the place to do that.

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: In Vinou you are able to change all PDF-Documents by creating your own templates.

mail.title: E-Mail setup
mail.description: The Vinou-Network and also your webshop are sending automated mail notifications. To use this you need to configure an SMTP-Mailbox.
